~ Professional Consulting ~

INTERCOOLER.JS ARCHITECTURE

Want to use intercooler.js to simplify your web application development, but not sure where to start? Want help leveraging the advanced functionality that intercooler brings to the table? We are the designers of intercooler and can help you and your team access the full power of intercooler.

SIMPLIFIED UX DEVELOPMENT

A core aspect of intercooler is the simplicity it brings to the table. We can ensure that you get the most bang for your complexity-budget buck (you do have a complexity budget, right?) when using intercooler. By leveraging existing web standards like HTML, REST, etc. you will be able to get more done with less code and fewer moving parts.

SERVER-SIDE EXPERTISE

Intercooler will work seamlessly with whatever server-side technology you are using. We can help you lay out your templates, learn how to take advantage of intercooler response headers to enable client-server message passing, etc. We have experience with Rails, Node, .NET, Python & Java and can pick up any other environment you might want to use with intercooler quickly.
